name: Bit Orchard (itch)
description:
Bit Orchard is a small farming life simulation game, made within four days using GB Studio. Heavily inspired by older games such as Harvest Moon and Rune Factory, this game includes farming, resource gathering, and many other activities.

Keyboard controls for PC Browser:
Arrow Keys (Directional Pad) - Move
Z (A Button) - Interact/OK
X (B Button) - Cancel
Enter (Start Button) - Menu
Shift (Select Button) - None

* This is a Gameboy game. Saving and Loading is not functional in browser, it is recommended to play the ROM using a Gameboy emulator instead.
